channel.title: Anyone know how to get skillcapes in shops?
channel.description:
Anyone know how to get skillcapes in shops? I wanted to know because when you get a 99 stat in my server (combat only) you get a skillcape but if you try and do it with other skills they don't appear.. So, I was wondering does anyone know how to make able to be bought in shops (Can't sell back) and price would be 1 gp ea
[IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/skillcapeshoppic.jpg[/img]
This is [u][b]NOT[/b][/u] a pic from my server I just got it from another thread
Would really appreciate it for your people's help thanks :D
Did I mention will give rep++
